  • Method Details

    • actPrimary

      @Deprecated default boolean actPrimary(Platform server, LocalConfiguration config, Player player, LocalSession session, Location clicked)
      Deprecated.
      New subclasses should override actPrimary(Platform, LocalConfiguration, Player, LocalSession, Location, Direction) instead
      Perform the primary action of this tool.
      Returns:
      true to cancel the original event which triggered this action (if possible)

    • actPrimary

      @NonAbstractForCompatibility(delegateName="actPrimary", delegateParams={Platform.class,LocalConfiguration.class,Player.class,LocalSession.class,Location.class}) default boolean actPrimary(Platform server, LocalConfiguration config, Player player, LocalSession session, Location clicked, @Nullable Direction face)
      Perform the primary action of this tool.
      Parameters:
      server - The platform
      config - The config instance
      player - The player
      session - The local session
      clicked - The location that was clicked
      face - The face that was clicked
      Returns:
      true to cancel the original event which triggered this action (if possible)
